p: The fatty acid profile of total fat in LT muscle is shown in Table 6. Compared with the NPD group, the LPD group contained a higher ( P < 0.05) percentage of oleic acid (C18:1n-9) and monounsaturated fatty acids (MUFA) and a lower percentage of C18:2n-6 ( P < 0.05) and PUFA ( P = 0.089). No significant differences ( P > 0.05) in fatty acid composition was detected between NPD and LPOB.
